"The Silence of the Enemies":
"Uh-oh, I'm in trouble!
We're getting on well with construction,
but a ton of enemies just appeared!
If they stick around, we might have to
cancel the event...
We can't let that happen. So please!
For the sake of everyone's fun memories,
protect the venue!
※Clear on Hard mode or higher
※Trigger quests are also acceptable"

"＊Woval Edge
※1 per character, given upon completion."
